REGISTRATION IS NOW OPEN FOR THE EVENING EVENTS OF THE FORUM

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Register now for the Media evening and the Closing evening of the 10th Convergences World Forum.

These two events will respectively take place on the 4th and 5th of September 2017 at the Grand Auditorium of the Palais Brongniart in Paris. Registration is free but mandatory.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#3f6266″ show_divider=”on” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” text_text_color=”#00305b” text_font_size=”20″]

[MEDIA EVENING]

To change the world, let’s start by changing the way we talk about it!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Monday, September 4th – [19h00-23h00]

Co-organised by Sparknews

With round-tables, pitches and  other playful formats, the first evening of the Forum, co-organized by Sparknews, will be a highlight dedicated to impact journalism.

Several journalists will be present to retrace their journey and their commitment to a positive journalism. A Sparkshow, which will present 5 innovative projects from the circular economy sector in front of a jury of journalists, will be another key moment of the event.

The media evening will be an opportunity to present Solutions & Co, a day in which 20 worldwide economic media are publishing solutions to tackle climate change and for a transition toward circular economy. The evening will end with a networking cocktail reception.

[CLOSING EVENING]

 AMBASSADORS OF A 3ZERO WORLD

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Tuesday, 5th September- [19h00-23h00]

With pitches and speeches of committed personalities, the Closing evening will be a moment of discovery, inspiration, but also action. Articulated around each of the 3Zeros (exclusion, carbon and poverty), the evening will highlight public, private and solidarity actors in the service of a fairer and more sustainable world.
